product_requests.description: An AI coding assistant that provides reliable, step-by-step bug fixes, explains its reasoning, and avoids getting stuck or over-engineering solutions.
product_requests.pain_point: Existing AI coding assistants frequently fail to fix bugs, provide incorrect or broken code, get stuck on problems, over-engineer solutions, and lack the ability to explain their failures or thought processes, leading to developer frustration and wasted time.

üë®: Doesn't work
üë®: Doesn't work
üë®: Doesn't work
üë®: Doesn't work

-- Claude, I need you to fix this bug.
[5 minutes thinking]
-- Here's your fixed code in 10 files. Actually, I have a better idea. Let me rewrite all these files once again.
[Rewriting for 10 minutes]
-- Ok, now you have a comprehensive solution. Let me know what you think. But before you go, let me rewrite these 10 files one more time, to simplify all and make all more robust.
[Rewriting for 25 minutes]
-- Ok, now you have the best solution. Let me know what you think.
[Solution fails.]

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
Please explain to me why I'm getting the following error and why what you have been telling me to do has not been working. And what you could do to actually address the underlying problem. This is the fourth time in a row that I've gotten the same error. And I want you to really think about this and answer me in bullets in plain English. Do not generate any code. Tell me exactly why you're messing up over and over and over again. Tell me exactly why you're failing me, Claude. Tell me exactly why you aren't being successful in this moment. You have failed repeatedly. Tell me specifically and fully why.
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

You are my expert coding assistant. I've provided my entire code base context, and I need a detailed, step-by-step solution to a specific problem. Your response must strictly adhere to the following structure and requirements.

Problem Statement
[Insert your specific problem description here]

Requirements
Provide a complete, implementation-ready solution
Follow my specific requirements exactly - do not deviate from them
Assume all my requirements have valid reasons behind them, even if they seem arbitrary
Explain your reasoning at each critical decision point
Include all necessary code, comments, and documentation
Solution Process
Please work through this problem in discrete, manageable steps. After each step, pause for my feedback before continuing to ensure we're on the right track.

Step 1: Problem Analysis
Break down the problem into its core components
Identify key constraints and requirements
Outline potential approaches
STOP HERE and wait for my confirmation before proceeding
Step 2: Architecture Design
Propose the overall solution architecture
Explain how components will interact
Identify any dependencies or external libraries needed
STOP HERE and wait for my confirmation before proceeding
Step 3: Implementation Plan
Outline the implementation sequence
Identify potential challenges and how to address them
Propose testing strategies
STOP HERE and wait for my confirmation before proceeding
Step 4: Core Implementation
Provide the essential code needed to solve the problem
Include detailed comments explaining each significant section
Ensure the code follows best practices
STOP HERE and wait for my confirmation before proceeding
Step 5: Enhancement and Optimization
Suggest optimizations for performance, readability, or maintainability
Address edge cases and potential failure points
Provide alternative approaches if applicable
STOP HERE and wait for my confirmation before proceeding
Step 6: Final Solution
Present the complete, integrated solution
Include all necessary code files and their content
Provide usage examples
Summarize the approach and highlight key decisions

product_requests.description: A project management or task tracking tool with advanced capabilities for defining, visualizing, and managing complex relationships and dependencies between tasks, issues, and entities.
product_requests.pain_point: Current project management tools lack robust features for clearly mapping and understanding intricate dependencies such as 'blocks', 'relates to', 'depends on', 'is subtask of', or 'has bug', making complex project tracking difficult.
product_requests.target_audience: Project Managers, Software Development Teams, Product Managers

product_requests.description: A tool or service that automatically monitors, manages, and intelligently handles API errors, particularly those related to rate limiting or server overload, including smart retry mechanisms.
product_requests.pain_point: Developers and systems frequently encounter API errors like 'overloaded_error' (529), requiring manual intervention and retries, which is inefficient and disruptive.

product_requests.description: An advanced code execution and debugging environment that helps identify the root cause of runtime failures, optimizes for memory efficiency, and assists in diagnosing elusive bugs that disappear during screen-sharing.
product_requests.pain_point: Developers struggle with code that doesn't run as expected, identifying performance bottlenecks (e.g., high memory usage), and debugging intermittent or 'disappearing' bugs during live sessions.

product_requests.description: An AI-powered assistant specifically designed to navigate, interpret, and update technical documentation and knowledge bases, ensuring accuracy and relevance for users.
product_requests.pain_point: AI assistants and users alike struggle with outdated or difficult-to-search documentation, leading to incorrect information, inefficient problem-solving, and wasted time.
product_requests.target_audience: Developers, Technical Writers, Support Teams, Users of complex software

product_requests.description: AI assistants tailored to specific, non-coding professional pain points, such as managing ignored Jira tickets, drafting sensitive HR communications (e.g., layoffs), or mitigating risks in weekend deployments.
product_requests.pain_point: Professionals face various domain-specific, often high-stakes or tedious, tasks that could be significantly improved by intelligent automation or specialized AI assistance, reducing stress and improving efficiency.
product_requests.target_audience: Project Managers, HR Professionals, DevOps Engineers, Sales Professionals, Recruiters

product_requests.description: A platform or tool designed to help individuals overcome creative blocks and procrastination, enabling them to consistently execute on their creative projects (e.g., writing, animating, drawing, game development).
product_requests.pain_point: Individuals with creative aspirations frequently struggle with the execution phase of their projects, leading to inaction, unfulfilled ideas, and frustration.
product_requests.target_audience: Content Creators, Artists, Game Developers, Hobbyists, Entrepreneurs

product_requests.description: A context-aware Q&A and knowledge-sharing platform integrated within specific online communities (e.g., Twitch, internal company chats) to facilitate direct and efficient information exchange, reducing the need for external searches.
product_requests.pain_point: Users often resort to general search engines for questions that could be easily and more accurately answered by experts within their immediate community, indicating a gap in efficient internal knowledge sharing.
product_requests.target_audience: Online Communities, Gaming Communities, Internal Corporate Teams, Niche Forums

product_requests.description: A comprehensive platform or accelerator designed to streamline and simplify the process of building and launching a SaaS product, from ideation to deployment.
product_requests.pain_point: Aspiring entrepreneurs and developers express a strong desire to build SaaS products but likely face significant barriers related to technical complexity, time, and resource allocation in the development lifecycle.
product_requests.target_audience: Aspiring Entrepreneurs, Solo Founders, Small Business Owners, Developers

product_requests.description: A utility or platform that simplifies and ensures the reliability of complex software installations and repackages, mitigating common issues and user frustration.
product_requests.pain_point: Users experience significant frustration and difficulty with specific types of software installations or repackages (e.g., 'Fitgirl Repacks'), indicating a need for a more robust, user-friendly, and reliable installation process.
product_requests.target_audience: Gamers, Software Enthusiasts, IT Support, Users of non-standard software distributions
